spell_list.description: Fires a stream of arrows in a cone in front of the ranger. For every target the ranger strikes, they get an increment of Repeated Salvo, which deals additional damage with the next attack. Higher ranks of this ability reduce the reuse time. Repeated Salvo can increment up to 6 times.
spell_list.description_pvp: Fires a stream of arrows in a cone in front of the ranger. For every target the ranger strikes, they get an increment of Repeated Salvo, which deals additional damage with the next attack. Higher ranks of this ability reduce the reuse time. Repeated Salvo can increment up to 6 times.

effect_list.description: Inflicts 9 - 17 ranged damage on targets in Area of Effect
Applies Repeated Salvo.  Lasts for 30.0 seconds.
On any combat or spell hit this spell will cast Repeated Salvo on target of attack.

spell_list.name: Rapid Salvo
